page.title: 11Nocton Farms - Machinery
page.content: There are many machines on Nocton Farms,so briefly there are about:- 70 tractors of different sizes and types.There are several different drills for sowing the different types of crops.4-5 sprayers and fertiliser distributors used for putting on the plant food and for protection from diseases.They use 6 Combine Harvesters for cutting and threshing corn crops (Wheat,barley).Also they use 3 pea podders for harvesting the peas and beans,2 potato harvesters for lifting the potatoes,2 beet harvesters for lifting the sugarbeet and many trailers to cart the produce from the field to the stores or sheds where it is inspected and stored ready for sale to their customers.The amount they spend changes from year to year but usually adds up to several million pounds a year.
